import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardHeader, Col, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Table } from 'reactstrap'; import usersData from './UsersData' class User extends Component { render() { const user = usersData.find( user => user.id.toString() === this.props.match.params.id) const userDetails = user ? Object.entries(user) : [['id', ( Not found)]] return (
User id: {this.props.match.params.id} { userDetails.map(([key, value]) => { return ( ) }) }
{`${key}:`} {value}
Cadastrar novo usuário
 
) } } export default User;
